headline: The Bank of New York Mellon Corporation (BK) Surpasses Q1 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
summary: The Bank of New York Mellon (BK) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 6.04% and 1.25%, respectively, for the quarter ended March 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?
